title: ‘The Motherload’: 20th Television to Develop Series Adaptation of Sarah Hoover Memoir (EXCLUSIVE)
summary: Sarah Hoover’s bestselling memoir “The Motherload: Episodes From the Brink of Motherhood” is in development as a drama series at 20th Television, sources tell Variety. Stuart Zicherman is attached as the showrunner, and Hoover will co-write the pilot with Sas Goldberg (“Only Murders in the Building…

title: Chinese camera company gives out gold keycaps worth up to $45,000 to top employees — more than 50 prizes given out by Insta360
summary: Webcam brand Insta360 has gifted real gold keycaps, worth up to $45,000 each, to its most valued employees.
